purpleculture_pinyin:
jiàn
to splash
брызгать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 溅)
Pictophonetic: 賤 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 賤 [ jiàn ] cheap, low, mean, worthless
heisig_chinese_memo: Water is seen as cheap in some countries and splattered around carelessly.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Tap water is cheap so people splatter it all over the place.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " cheap " sound. "Said Wen" None. " Splash " means that the liquid is projected by impact. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Wei Cesan": "Wang is anxious to summon the emperor, but the emperor can't do it, the blood is splashed on the front of the king!" Biographies of Lian Polin Xiangru: "Within five steps, Xiangru, please get blood on the neck!"

"Splash" is an onomatopoeia to describe the sound of water. Such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Horizontally blowing tunes. "Mulan Poetry": "I don't hear the voice of my grandpa calling girls, but I hear the water of the Yellow River splashing and splashing." Yuan Zhen of the Tang Dynasty "Fu Rongren": "Dark water splashed into the old pond, and the flat sand filled the bright moon."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " cheap " sound. " Splash " means that the liquid is projected by impact.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「賤」聲。《說文》無。「濺」表示液體受沖擊而迸射。如《戰國策．魏策三》：「王急召君，君不行，血濺君襟矣！」《史記．廉頗藺相如列傳》：「五步之內，相如請得以頸血濺大王矣！」

　　「濺濺」是象聲詞，形容水聲。如《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭．木蘭詩》：「不聞爺孃喚女聲，但聞黃河流水鳴濺濺。」唐代元稹〈縛戎人〉：「暗水濺濺入舊池，平沙漫漫鋪明月。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「賤」聲。「濺」表示液體受沖擊而迸射。

①液體受衝擊向四外飛射：水花飛濺。
(Simplified: 溅)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 賤 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: Water is seen as cheap in some countries and splattered around carelessly.
Meaning: splatter
Hanzi: 溅
Story: Tap water is cheap so people splatter it all over the place.
Kind: traditional

從「 水 」，「 賤 」聲。《說文》無。「 濺 」表示液體受沖擊而迸射。如《戰國策．魏策三》：「王急召君，君不行，血濺君襟矣！」《史記．廉頗藺相如列傳》：「五步之內，相如請得以頸血濺大王矣！」 「濺濺」是象聲詞，形容水聲。如《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭．木蘭詩》：「不聞爺孃喚女聲，但聞黃河流水鳴濺濺。」唐代元稹〈縛戎人〉：「暗水濺濺入舊池，平沙漫漫鋪明月。」
From " water" to " cheap" sound. "Said Wen" None. " Splash" means that the liquid is projected by impact. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Wei Cesan": "Wang is anxious to summon the emperor, but the emperor can't do it, the blood is splashed on the front of the king!" Biographies of Lian Polin Xiangru: "Within five steps, Xiangru, please get blood on the neck!" "Splash" is an onomatopoeia to describe the sound of water. Such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Horizontally blowing tunes. "Mulan Poetry": "I don't hear the voice of my grandpa calling girls, but I hear the water of the Yellow River splashing and splashing." Yuan Zhen of the Tang Dynasty "Fu Rongren": "Dark water splashed into the old pond, and the flat sand filled the bright moon."

濺字的基本解释

濺
jiàn

濺
jiān
均见“溅”。

濺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》子賤切，去線，精。］
“溅1”的繁体字。亦作“湔2”。
液体迸射。
[②]［jiān］
［《廣韻》則前切，平先，精。］
“溅2”的繁体字。
见“濺2濺”。

濺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濺； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页657第38
【廣韻】則旋切【集韻】【韻會】將先切，?音箋。濺濺，水疾流貌。【沈約詩】出浦水濺濺。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?子賤切，音箭。水激也。通作湔。【史記·藺相如傳】相如請得以頸血濺大王。　又【集韻】則旰切，音贊。與灒同。汗灑也。　又才線切，音賤。激也。　【集韻】或作淺。又作?。通作碊。

濺字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。
